name: Tex-Mex Ribs
preparation: Place a cooling rack on sheet pan and add water. Place ribs on top.
Liberally shake Sriracha Sauce Mix on both sides of ribs. Rub in if desired.
Tightly cover ribs with foil and steam in oven for 1 1⁄2 hours. Remove and drain off any liquid.
Preheat barbecue to medium-high. Lightly oil grill to prevent sticking.
Liberally brush both sides of ribs with Tex-Mex Grilling Sauce. Grill for 4–5 minutes per side. Serve with extra sauce, if desired.
tips: Slowly steam before grilling to ensure tender, moist ribs every time.
